channel.title: Need a server hoster please
channel.description:
I need someone to host my server as my portforwarding isn't working.. -.-
I do not want to be charged real money or rediculous propositions on the server. I will proberbly give you admin on the server, but that is about all.
my server is mostly leeched atm, but the only reason is, is that i don't think there is any point editing it untill i can get it running..
ta. :)
